/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant energy.
